vecUnachieved.strDescription: Avoid fighting Carter and achieve Ending "Beautiful Reality" in Soladnit.
Defeat O'Quill in his berserk state.
Defeat the Clown when there's no gift box on the field.
Defeat Ryan when he is at his best status.

vecUnachieved.strName: A Beautiful Day for a Ballgame
Admit it, I'm stronger than you now
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Defeat Afogomorn without using Future Prediction.

vecUnachieved.strName: What kind of adult do you want to be, Anan?

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Defeat the Rippers without using the Crystal of the Elder Things.

vecUnachieved.strName: Creed is Made to be Broken
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Defeat Cthugha’s Ember while equipped with the trait "Flame Worshipper".
Defeat Tindalos after they successfully use Final Spiral at least once when their HP is 50 or below.

data.strFullDescription:
Depersonalization is a COC-like RPG. TRPG! Dice! Cthulhu! Bad End! Multi-branch! A different world starting from zero!
The game consists of multiple modules, each of which has multiple endings and branch routes,  striving to build a diverse, themed world.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1477070/extras/调查员创建02.gif?t=1723347798[/img]

[list][*]Players can create a variety of characters, and advance the story through free exploration, investigation, reasoning, selection and other actions, and finally reach the end.[/list]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1477070/extras/跑团式玩法3.gif?t=1723347798[/img]

[list][*]No rigid growth system, all attribute are served with narrative.
[*]Character's attributes will influence the direction of the story, which allows players to experience a more multi-faceted plot. Maybe someone with low attributes is more likely to trigger incredible events.[/list]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1477070/extras/多元化模组02.gif?t=1723347798[/img]

[list][*]There will be a lot of choices in the story module. Different players can reach various plots and endings. These experiences eventually come together and form a complete story with ups and downs.
[*]But it is worth mentioning that you are playing a role, and the character's 'personality' and 'experience' will influence your choices.
[*]No matter investigation modules, infinite modules,plain text modules or strange story modules, it will be supported in different modes.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1477070/extras/策略性战斗02.gif?t=1723347798[/img]
[list][*]Completely break away from the traditional battle template. Flexible options in the battle will allow you to create different worlds of their own.[/list]

[b]We are the prisoners of fate. However, occasionally we can make a big difference and create miracles![/b]
data.strSnippet: Dice! Tabletop role-playing games! Cthulhu! Diverse story modules! Rich branching narratives! We are prisoners of fate, but sometimes we also roll the dice and create miracles!
